article.title: Status and history for khk
article.para: No known problems at this time.

history.history-entry: replaced the erroneous occurrences LATIN characters with their CYRILLIC look-alike; thanks to Arthur Reutenauer for providing this update.
stage 4: full version provided by Chuluun Erdenebat and Ulziibat Batbaatar via the Language Observatory.
stage 2: entered in the index, OHCHR identified as the source.
